vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.11;
son of: Levi (H3878);
brother of: Kohath (H6955), Merari (H4847) and Jochebed (H3115);
father of: Libni (H3845) and Shimei (H8096); also called Gershom at 1Ch.6.16,17,20,43,62,71; 15.7;
Group of ge.re.shon (גֵּרְשׁוֹן "Gershon" H1648)
§ Gershonite = see Geshur
a descendant of Gershon, firstborn son of Levi
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Guersón, hijo de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
革順人 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 參看基述 (1450)
革順的後代, 利未的長子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
革顺人 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 参看基述 (1450)
革顺的后代, 利未的长子
